text: Tini to tomadera srsti karechena matira dbara, atahpara sukrabindu dbara, atahpara jamata rakta dbara, atahpara tomaderake bera karena sisurupe, atahpara tomara yaubane padarpana kara, atahpara bardhakye upanita ha'o. Tomadera kara'o kara'o era purbe'i mrtyu ghate ebam tomara nirdharita kale paumcha ebam tomara yate anudhabana kara.
